00039 #include "CmdLightKitModified.h"
00040 
00041 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoSceneKit.h>
00042 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoNodeKitListPart.h>
00043 
00044 #include "TGateEngine.h"
00045 #include "tgf.h"
00046 #include "Trace.h"
00047 
00048 
00049 CmdLightKitModified::CmdLightKitModified( TLightKit* newLightKit, SoSceneKit* scene, SceneModel& sceneModel, QUndoCommand* parent )
00050 : QUndoCommand("Modify LightKit", parent), m_pPreviousLightKit( 0 ), m_pNewLightKit( newLightKit ), m_scene( scene ), m_pModel( &sceneModel )
00051 {
00052     Trace trace( "CmdLightKitModified::CmdLightKitModified", false );
00053         m_pNewLightKit->ref();
00054         
00055         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* > ( m_scene->getPart("lightList[0]", false) );
00056         if( lightKit )  m_pPreviousLightKit = dynamic_cast< TLightKit* >( lightKit->copy( true ) );
00057 
00058 }
00059 
00060 CmdLightKitModified::~CmdLightKitModified()
00061 {
00062         Trace trace( "CmdLightKitModified::~CmdLightKitModified", false );
00063         m_pNewLightKit->unref();
00064 }
00065 
00066 void CmdLightKitModified::undo()
00067 {
00068         Trace trace( "CmdLightKitModified::undo", false );
00069   
00070     if( m_pPreviousLightKit )
00071     {
00072         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* > ( m_scene->getPart("lightList[0]", false) );
00073                 
00074                 TShape* shape =static_cast< TShape* > ( m_pPreviousLightKit->getPart("icon", false) );
00075                 lightKit->setPart("icon", shape );
00076                 
00077                 TSunShape* sunhape =static_cast< TSunShape* > ( m_pPreviousLightKit->getPart("tsunshape", false) );
00078                 lightKit->setPart("tsunshape", sunhape );
00079     }
00080     else
00081     {
00082         m_pModel->RemoveLightNode( *m_pNewLightKit );
00083     }
00084 }
00085 
00086 void CmdLightKitModified::redo( )
00087 {
00088         Trace trace( "CmdLightKitModified::redo", false );
00089         
00090    if( !m_pPreviousLightKit )
00091         {
00092                  m_pModel->InsertLightNode( *m_pNewLightKit );
00093         }
00094         else
00095         {       
00096                 TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* > ( m_scene->getPart("lightList[0]", false) );
00097                 
00098                 TShape* shape =static_cast< TShape* > ( m_pNewLightKit->getPart("icon", false) );
00099                 lightKit->setPart("icon", shape );
00100                 
00101                 TSunShape* sunhape =static_cast< TSunShape* > ( m_pNewLightKit->getPart("tsunshape", false) );
00102                 lightKit->setPart("tsunshape", sunhape );
00103                 
00104         }
00105 
00106 }
